com.salesmanager.shop.store.services.product

Class ShopProductRESTController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesmanager.shop.store.services.product.ShopProductRESTController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(value="/services")
public class ShopProductRESTController
extends java.lang.Object
    API to create, read, updat and delete a Product API to create Manufacturer
    Author:
    Carl Samson
